sentences: Ajas mu vastust kuuldes silmad suureks.
Lapsed nägid looma ja tegid selle peale suuri silmi.
context: Suuri is the partitive plural form of the Estonian adjective 'suur' meaning big/large. It appears in expressions like 'tegile peale suuri silmi' which means to make wide eyes in surprise or amazement, indicating someone is looking at something with astonishment or wonder.
